name: WhyCetera
0:
”Alexa Ask Cetera how to use this skill”
”Alexa ask Cetera who is Cetera”
”Alexa ask Cetera what is the Advice Centric Experience”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cetera
des:
This Alexa skill was designed to provide recruiters and financial advisors with high level information about the Cetera Financial Group® network of independent broker-dealer firms including a few of the reasons why you should join.

Just ask these simple questions to learn WHY CETERA:

• Ask Cetera, who is Cetera?
• Ask Cetera, why are they focused on delivering an Advice-Centric Experience™?
• Ask Cetera, what is Cetera doing about the Department of Labor rule?
• Ask Cetera, what does the Advice-Centric Experience™ represent for Cetera?
• Ask Cetera, what advantage do our advisors receive from the Advice-Centric Experience™?
• Ask Cetera, what should clients expect from the Advice-Centric Experience™?
• Ask Cetera, what is the Advice-Centric Experience™?
• Ask Cetera, what is Decipher™?
• Ask Cetera, what is My Advice Architect™?
• Ask Cetera, what is Referral Rewards?
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
